text: The Psychopath is a 1966 British crime horror movie directed by Freddie Francis and starring Patrick Wymark, Margaret Johnson, John Standing, Alexander Knox, Thorley Walters, Judy Huxtable. IT wa distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * The Psychopath at TCMDB * * Category:1966 crime movies Category:1966 horror movies Category:British crime movies Category:British horror movies Category:Serial killer movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Freddie Francis
title: The Psychopath
